scripts.release:finish: branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | cut -d'/' -f2); git pull origin release/${branch} && git fetch && git pull origin master && npm run standard-version -- --release-as minor && git flow release finish -Fpn ${branch} && git push --tags
scripts.hotfix:finish: branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | cut -d'/' -f2); git pull origin hotfix/${branch} && git fetch && git pull origin master && npm run standard-version -- --release-as patch && git flow hotfix finish -Fpn ${branch} && git push --tags
